name: The weekly growth percent of wild monsters is 1.1 times.
description: The number of wild creatures naturally increases by 10% every week (this is the default natural growth rate of wild monsters in the original version of Heroes of Might & Magic III).
author: like

chinese.name: 野怪周增长率1.1倍
chinese.description: 野外生物数量每周自然增长10%（这是英雄无敌3原版默认的野怪自然增长率）。
